QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between landing and loiter points.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingHeading
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Heading from loiter point to land point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LoiterAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Aircraft will proceed to the loiter point and loiter downwards until it reaches this approach altitude. Once altitude is reached the aircraft will proceed to land.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: GlideSlope
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The glide slope between the loiter and landing point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ValueSetIsDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Value controller loiter point is distance
